game_name: Dynamic Spanish Trips - Long Weekend in Spain
game_description: Explore Spain while speaking Spanish! Go on a "Long Weekend in Spain" using your Oculus Quest to explore 4 places in a series of 360 videos and photos, using AI speech recognition to practise your pronunciation. Discover the culture, history, and language in immersive, interactive videos and photos! We have FREE online materials (transcripts, additional activities) that you can access by signing up using the links in the app. We also have MORE Trips to explore and you can find out how update your app at VRLanguages.co.uk. We also have a beginner Spanish VR course. We're a small team with big hearts that want to make learning Spanish as fun as possible!
review_2: 360 photo and video tours in Spanish. Great beta app with many updates coming!
